parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description:
The frontend port used by the CLB instance.

Valid values: **1** to **65535**.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the CLB instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the CLB instance.

You can query the region ID from the [Regions and zones](~~40654~~) list or by calling the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation.
